name: The Power of Thor
description:
THE POWER OF THOR

This game is part of the Digital Art Academy Applicate! the most important in latinoamerica, teaching kids how to code,  My name is Kike! I'm 11 years old and I developed this game, where Thor is trying to fight with Loky but he put a spell making Thor fly infinitely... and if Thor fly enogh, he could escape from that spell.

this game is inspirated in flappy bird but I did my own character, my own graphics and my own background, and off course I code everything in Unity ;) yeah with just 11 years, what are you doing with your life?!

Follow Us!
